response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product which I believe would significantly enhance your business operations. Given its value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000 to you. My proposal is to offer it to you at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a great opportunity to secure such a valuable asset at a discounted rate compared to its market value. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can collaborate soon.", "product_price": 12000}
